entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:39 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
